_source.text: Actually, the only redeeming thing about them was the filter used on the camera and the interrogator's voice (I say that because I swear to you that it was Paul Eiding, better known for voicing Col. Campbell in MGS1 & 2 [I love MGS if you didn't know) even though he's not credited for being in this at all).

_source.text: A baby is so innocent and curious to the new world around them what more better then to be the one to show them that they dont need to be fearful at such a young age because we love them and they can trust and rely on us to be there supporting them every step of the way.
